remarks: DN_1 for decidable propositions.  Without the decidability conditions, DN_1 can serve as a single axiom for Boolean algebra.  See ~ http://www-unix.mcs.anl.gov/~~mccune/papers/basax/v12.pdf . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 22-Apr-2018.)
statement: dn1dc $p |- ( ( DECID ph /\ ( DECID ps /\ ( DECID ch /\ DECID th ) ) ) -> ( -. ( -. ( -. ( ph \/ ps ) \/ ch ) \/ -. ( ph \/ -. ( -. ch \/ -. ( ch \/ th ) ) ) ) <-> ch ) ) $.
